citations.narrative:
The licensee moved to another state (more than 90 days ago) and did not notify APHIS of a change in operation of their
licensed facility in Wisconsin. Not updating APHIS on changes in operation and location doesn't permit routine inspection
of the facility and animals, if applicable. Ensure to contact APHIS and update the status of this facility.
***Correct prior to any regulated activity.

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 3:45PM on April
14, 2023. I knocked on the door of what used to be the licensee's residence. A person there said that the licensee moved
to another state and the licensee no longer operates the facility here. I called the number on file, left a voicemail and
have not received a call back.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee moved to another state (more than 90 days ago) and did not notify APHIS of a change in operation of their 
licensed facility in Wisconsin.  Not updating APHIS on changes  in operation and location doesn't permit routine inspection 
of the facility and animals, if applicable.  Ensure to contact APHIS and update the status of this facility.  
***Correct prior to any regulated activity. 
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany an APHIS Official during the inspection process at 3:45PM on April 
14, 2023. I knocked on the door of what used to be the licensee's residence.  A person there said that the licensee moved 
to another state and the licensee no longer operates the facility here.  I called the number on file, left a voicemail and 
have not received a call back. 
 
 
 
End Section
